price: Allah'ın, ötedenberi süregelen kanunu budur. Allah'ın kanununda asla bir değişiklik bulamazsın.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
